column4: templet:: it worked before...so why change ownership/permissions...just adjust mountoptions in /etc/mtab
usually a external drive is plug and play.  maheanuu can also assign a fixed mount point using a filesystem labeller if anyone wishes to help him out in that regard.
you can also be right about /etc/mtab i've never had to mess with that file in the history of my life

your solution will work, but something on the system changed....so the perms are not working anymore....nothing on the disk changed...so my suggestion is to fix what changed on the system....and that you can do in /etc/mtab
